record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - May 07, 2008)

[Page: H3154]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days within which to revise and extend their remarks on H.R. 5818, and to insert extraneous material thereon.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from California?
